website_summaries.verdict: This highly-rated product offers a fair price for buyers wanting a dependable, square-shaped swing can.
pros: Rectangular design fits well in corners of kitchen
Lid swings into place after use
Holds 16 gallons for larger families and shops
Quick-release buttons allow lid to be easily removed when bag needs changing
cons: Simplehuman liners are needed for a perfect fit, but other liners can be used if you do not mind an awkward fit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution whrn you can't hide your garbage can.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this with reservations - I'd been looking for sn attractive garbage can (!?!) that would work with Costco 18 gal. bags. Ordered this can and the bags. Much to my surprise, the bags seem larger than the ones I've used for years, are strong, fit the can perfectly. The can is designed to hold the bag in place. It's easy to clean, amd the swing top keeps fruit flies and other insects out. I'm in Hawaii, where food, even the tiniest bit, will attract insects out of nowhere. This can exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: L. Simrell

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can. It's well made and durable. I really like the lid because it fits on very securely, and the part that moves when you put trash in it is well balanced ensuring that it will return to the "closed" position. This size is great even if using 13 gal bags because they fit perfectly, and the larger aspect of can allows them fill completely, instead of 3/4 capacity like a 13gal garbagecan causes. I haven't tried 16 gal bags yet. What else can I say? It works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: M. Rehage

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: I hate that trash cans are always white. They get so dirty! And they stand-out if you don't have a white kitchen. So it took me a while to find this, but I am glad I got it. It is large and holds a lot. The swing lid keeps people (or kids, rather.) from throwing things in the garbage and missing or getting debris on the wall! I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several trash cans in my kitchen but this is my favorite. It's sturdy and the top kind of clicks in place so it's not always falling. I love that it's larger than a typical kitchen trash can.
customer_reviews.author: C Cox

customer_reviews.title: So Happy, wish they offered 10 gallon
customer_reviews.text: So happy, I just love my simplehuman 16 gallon trash cans💕. So much room and easy access while throwing trash out. I wish I had an option to get a third smaller 10 gallon can for compost, it’s only offered in the UK Amazon. The shipping from UK is over 70.00. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Love this can so far. The lid is a little bit difficult to manuever on to the bottom hence the 4 stars. But overall I liked the look of this trash can. I don't want to draw any attention to it. With my lower back problems, this will be nice not having to bend over as far to empty the trash. Our 13 gal force flex bags just stretch over the can, but I might be looking for some bigger bags. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Megan D

customer_reviews.title: Swinging Lid too troublesome & messy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it because of the larger size. However, after using it for almost a year, I’m finally giving up. The balanced swing lid is horrible! It moves inward so if garbage is 3/4 full, everything gets in the lid. Trying to scrape food off the plate is impossible without getting the lid dirty. I really wanted to give this a try but only way to use it is to take the lid off each time I need to throw away leftover scraps from the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S. Cawley

customer_reviews.title: It is attractive and excellent quality. The lid is thick and sturdy and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of parts breaking down on trash cans and decided to give this one a try. It is attractive and excellent quality. The lid is thick and sturdy and can take a beating. The only negative that I will say is that it is a strange size. It is possible to use tall kitchen trash bags but the can is actually taller than the bags so they hang above the bottom a bit. I've tried larger bags but then the bag gathers up at the top and looks sloppy. I would recommend this trash can 100% for the quality, attractiveness and price.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Our favorite trashcan for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of seven so this thing has been a saving grace. Hard to find a big trashcan that isn’t for outside use. We love it very sturdy, love it very pleased!! Keeps trash bags in place doesn’t fall through the can. A+
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rocking top and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but well worth it. Self closing top rocks on metal to nylon bushings and works flawlessly. Product is very well made and sturdy. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable item!
customer_reviews.text: I really am loving my new swing lid trash can that fits very well in my kitchen. I couldn't believe how strong and durable that this item was and it's a pretty descent size can too with a great price! I know this trash can will last for a very long time, high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty in Pink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: After looking all over for a decent sized trash can that would complement our kitchen area, I found the Simplehuman 60L. This is a perfect fit for our needs... large enough so you aren't emptying it every 15 mins. It's as attractive as a trash can can be ;-) The black with silver accents looks great and the bag-hide feature keeps things looking tidy. It's easy to clean with a removable cover that makes the job even easier. The best part is it's heavy duty plastic so it doesn't get dented up like the stainless models available today.
customer_reviews.author: Quahog

customer_reviews.title: Well made and built
customer_reviews.text: But it's plastic. I'm in the thermoplastics business so know how inexpensive the resin was to make this.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Something we didn't think about
customer_reviews.text: The actual trash can is very durable and well made, but we didn't think about the fact that you can't scrap a plate into a swing lid style can. Now we wish we had gotten a step-on to open type trash can. We have actually removed the entire lid because this one gets in the way so much. It isn't the can's fault- we just don't like this style after all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Seller, Great Quality Product and Fast Shipping Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Padilla

customer_reviews.title: we love it. Compared to our old trash can
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trash can just over a month ago and as a family, we love it. Compared to our old trash can, which is twice the cost of this one, it is roomy and We do not have to change bags more than once a week which makes it very cost effective. The only thing which is not a major issue for my family u cannot empty your plate straight into it without help or taking lid off. This is a keeper and I love it. Will definitely recommend. No regrets here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy and built to last
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality. I am pleased. I keep spending money on the same cheap Walmart cans and throw them out after 1 year. This should last years and years. Because the swing top is so high up above the rim of the can you can fill the can all the way to the top of the trash bag which saves on bags and money. It is heavy plastic and you do not see the plastic bag liner which is sort of nice. Expensive but should last years.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Nice trash can!
customer_reviews.text: We have had several compliments on this trash can. Had it about 6 months, seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: brian reviews1

customer_reviews.title: Nice garbage can with a catch
customer_reviews.text: It's a nicely designed garbage can and well made but unless you're using the proprietary garbage bags that are only made by simplehuman and are stupid expensive the liner fit is not very good. There is a lot of space under a standard kitchen bag which leads to the liner sagging, ripping, and coming loose when it starts to get full.
customer_reviews.author: Tysonius Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if it'd fit my space but it's perfect. Swingy lid is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Davis

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Just too small. Ad said for large families. Too small. Compact
customer_reviews.author: LORI FIFE

customer_reviews.title: Very good for trash and keeping smells inside the bin
customer_reviews.text: Very good for trash and keeping smells inside the bin. Taking the lid off can stump people at first. You pull the handles and lift.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, durable product. I'm very happy with this purchase. On a side note, my son is very happy since we switched from an 8 gallon can and he doesn't have to empty it out as often!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not seal odors in properly
customer_reviews.text: Good looking product, good reviews but I was rather disappointed at first sight. Lid does not seal odors in properly. Lid seal could be improved and for me is a big weakness. Cheaper bins with 90° open/close lids seal in odors much better.
customer_reviews.author: Goz

customer_reviews.title: We had gone through more then just a few kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: We had gone through more then just a few kitchen trash cans two at a time. One for trash the other for recycle. The spring tops or other types of lids usually gave out early on. The upgrade to two of these units, although pricy, has solved any issues we've had in the past.......thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Trail Images

customer_reviews.title: Well satisfied, sturdy receptacle
customer_reviews.text: Good can, I like it. Lid gets dirty easily. Very solid and exactly what I wanted, just not sure whether I should go for the foot lift type can in the end.
customer_reviews.author: G. Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: To bulky
customer_reviews.text: They need to bring the 13 gallon garbage can back 16 gallon is way to big
customer_reviews.author: Rafael moronta

customer_reviews.title: The first garbage can I have loved.
customer_reviews.text: It seems silly to LOVE your garbage can, but I do. This one is early to keep clean and simple to change out the bags. It is a larger capacity than my last garbage can in the kitchen - but takes up WAY less space. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AJB

customer_reviews.title: Best damn trash can ever made
customer_reviews.text: Best damn trash can ever made. If you want the perfect wedding gift, this is it. Stops the stink, the can is larger than the bag, it's easy to take out, and an over all damn fine product. I am getting up in years and this is my favorite kitchen can ever.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great waste recipticle, as far as trash cans go. Big enough but not way too big.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bess

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! After looking for so long I finally got a trash can that was reasonable in price and the perfect fit for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Juana Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good size, quality
customer_reviews.text: I never thought a trashcan could look classy, but this one manages it. Huge size means less pulling and who doesn't like that?
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. The lid is nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The lid is nice and sturdy. Perfect size for a kitchen. Not to big and not to small.
customer_reviews.author: sdr

customer_reviews.title: good kitchen garbage can
customer_reviews.text: it holds the garbage we put in there; afterall its a garbage can! the lids a little fussy to get off so only 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: middle aged in tx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great, I use it for recycling. It's tall and slim and holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilfillan

customer_reviews.title: Great Garbage Can
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a large garbage can forever. This is sturdy and looks great in my kitchen. It is hard to find a great large garbage can and this is it. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Vananda Slayden

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trash can. Well made, durable and easy to clean. Plus it's not ugly as my kitchen is small an It sits out for all to see.
customer_reviews.author: tiffani gilbert

customer_reviews.title: We purchased it because the lid of the old one ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it because the lid of the old one is broken. Hope there is someone just sells the lid, not the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Great design and the exact right size.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Other than that love it!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find reasonable prices trash bags that fit! Other than that love it !
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Bottle Disposal Can
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased for users in the fitness center to deposit plastic bottles. A plastic bag fits easily in the can. It is attractive and fits under the machine that provides cleaning tissues.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn propper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect garbage can for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect garbage can for my kitchen! It's taller than most standard cans so it holds a lot more. Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Erin McNealy

customer_reviews.title: Trash can
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and the flip lid makes it convenient. Fits regular size trash bags which is convenient as well. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: N. Roodsari

customer_reviews.title: This is the best trash can ever!
customer_reviews.text: This came a day early and only took a couple of days to get to HI! This is the best trash can we've ever had, well worth the price. It does easily use regular 13 gallon tall kitchen drawstring bags by glad, which we normally use. The 16 gallon can size gives the 13 gallon bag room to grow so you don't waste a bit of your bag. The top swing is weighted and swings shut after every use. It has a slim design that fits in our space perfectly. We highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Tribe

customer_reviews.title: Yaaassss! Finally a dog proof trashcan!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought so many trashcans trying to find one my boxer can't get into and I think I finally found it. I use the bags with the drawstring and have no trouble getting it onto the can. I use regular 13 gallon kitchen bags and actually like the fact that they hang above bottom. I can fill my bags more and the dog can't snatch the stuff off the top. I was leery about the price but it's worth it. The lid is secure too so that punk can't pop it up with his nose. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L2S96

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to invest in simplehuman products!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would feel empowered by a trash can but this "simpehuman" product has made me feel super human! I love this trash can!! It arrived quickly and was well packaged. Top snaps right on and swings free. The can is good looking, well made, and comes with a 5 year warranty. I am using this for my beverage container recycling and the bottle bags (similar in size to 13 gallon trash bags) fit fine without any bottom support. I am a simple human being who has become a simplehuman fan for life. These products are more than a purchase they are an investment.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great trashcan for small spaces. The 13gal bag is snug but fits the rim (that's what she said).
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Best Trash Can Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've never reviewed a trash can, but this one is an amazing alternative to the too small under the counter rubber waste cans! The can swing works perfectly. It holds so much more than I ever thought. I purchased the simplehuman bags designed for the can and they are strong, sturdy, and a perfect fit! Simplehuman makes very high quality items and this one is certainly no exception. Although their items are expensive I've always believed in the adage "you get what you pay for".
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the perfect trash can. I can move it easily when I need to throw away kitchen scraps. The top is easy to manage when my hands are full. I like the height, no more stooping. I am glad to get rid of my battery operated can that was hard to maintain. The surface looks easy to clean and to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Costco battery operated trash can with this
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of replacing batteries in my old Costco trash can with the manic opening lid, this trash can is bigger and much simlier to is. No battery use is an added benefit. Only downside I have found is you need three hands to scrape off dinner dishes, but otherwise a great trash can for the money.
customer_reviews.author: USMC-Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT kitchen trash can! Holds SO much!! And the lid is heavy duty - not flimsy like store bought cans. The bags fit so snuggly there’s no separation or tearing. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: J Buffalo Head

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Very large. Quality is excellent. Tall kitchen bags are too small for it. Edit: Finally found a great fitting bag for this trash can. Sold on Amazon: Hefty Strong Large Trash Bags - 33 Gallon, 48 Count
customer_reviews.author: RemyJax

customer_reviews.title: Best trash can I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this product. I absolutely adore it and recommend it to anyone who needs a taller trashcan like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Love

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: I had gone to several local stores looking for a larger trashcan for the kitchen. I don't like the step-on lids, because they always get unhinged.In the store, I saw a smaller version of the Simply Human can with the swing lid, but it was too small. After I got home, I went online and was delighted this model came in the larger size. The lid is secure, swings freely, and can be effortlessly removed when it is time to change the bag. The bag neatly tucks in and doesn't slip during use. The can holds standard kitchen size bags.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: As far as garbage cans go
customer_reviews.text: As far as garbage cans go ... Pretty pretty good. I like the lid design when allows me to stuff bags to the hilt, and the spinning thing makes it easy to one-hand trash in.
customer_reviews.author: CJU

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely hate this trash can
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this trash can. If I could get my money back and switch for a different style I would. The swing lid concept is just terrible for a kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ma'Barker Cakes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Trash Can for your Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's just a trash can but it's a trash can I've come to really like. It's a great size, holds a lot. It's easy to change the bag out. It's easy to take the top off. The smell isn't exactly gone since it's a flip top but we try not to put smelly items in the trash anyway. Best part is the animals can't get into it.
customer_reviews.author: PacNW Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic garbage can
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can is a cut above the rest. Sure, it costs more, but it's worth it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: music4one

customer_reviews.title: I bought this trash can because of all the good reviews but there is nothing special about this trash ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trash can because of all the good reviews but there is nothing special about this trash can. Is just like the ones at Walmart or target just more expensive. Plus the size of the trash bags you can only find here in Amazon. I don't think is worth how much it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Emeralky

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy flip top bin large enough for the bigger trash bags. Easy to remove lid when the bag needs changing.
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I just received my trash bin and it’s perfect for my kitchen. Will update the review after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee LaRouge

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love the larger size. You do have to buy larger trash bags. Trying to stretch the 13 gal did not work for me but I found larger bags locally. Expensive can but worth it for the extra size.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: This is the third one I have purchased I love this trash can I have them in different places ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have purchased I love this trash can I have them in different places in my home!
customer_reviews.author: Dune

customer_reviews.title: Great Size!!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, big enough for 30-39 gallon bag. Great size esp for large family!
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Very good, large size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very large capacity; not ugly; sturdy lid top. The swing top does require some clearance, so you can't stuff it to the tippity top.
customer_reviews.author: NimsVA

customer_reviews.title: It is possible to love a garbage can
customer_reviews.text: It is possible to love a garbage can? If so, sign me up for this one. I love its simplicity and ease of cleaning. It also does a good job of holding in odors without being airtight.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST garbage can ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST garbage can ever!!!! Never thought I would say this, but I love my new garbage can!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Hoag

customer_reviews.title: Priced accurately
customer_reviews.text: Tough plastic, not lightweight and very well made. Swings smoothly, top cover has a hefty weight to it and attaches well to the tall bin with a secure snap of the sides. It's sleek, tall and thin. Sounds sexy already.
customer_reviews.author: Josy

customer_reviews.title: I never thought I would love a trash can
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would love a trash can, but alas it has happened and I recommend everyone buy this
customer_reviews.author: Me:)

customer_reviews.title: Simple human trash bid
customer_reviews.text: Great product, received quickly and just as described. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet L. Zwaskis

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a recycle bin
customer_reviews.text: We are currently using this one as our recycle bin. The top flips both ways like it's supposed to. Good size for recylables.
customer_reviews.author: Property

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great can. Easy to take lid off to dump, keep looking nice, keeps dog out. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chartier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: SimpleHuman makes good products, we bought a second bin for recycling and naturally it had to be SimpleHuman. GREAT !
customer_reviews.author: Steven Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trash can
customer_reviews.text: I think I have finally found a trash can that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: IBemilyH

customer_reviews.title: Good trash can
customer_reviews.text: We love this trash can. It holds a fair amount of trash and holds the bag in place. You can use store bought bags with the can.
customer_reviews.author: robert hammon

customer_reviews.title: Very well made...Bigger then you think from picture. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made...Bigger then you think from picture. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best Garbage Can Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would write a review about a garbage can, but this is the best garbage can I have ever found for my kitchen. This can is really well made. I use the 13 gallon bags and there is plenty of room for the lid to swing to and fro. The lid is well constructed. It is nice and heavy, yet it is easily pushed open, and I no longer have to worry about the pets getting into the trash. Great can!
customer_reviews.author: Eastender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Modern, big enough for a family home small enough for a family kitchen. I love it...
customer_reviews.author: Trivy2U

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: For spending the $60 that I spent I was pleased with the quality. This is going into a comercial setting and it looks great and seams steady enough to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio naji

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen trash can.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best trash can I have ever owned for my kitchen. Nice size, fits regular 13 gallon size trash bags, the trash bag is always secure, and I get my money's worth on my trash bags. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Merine Kanhai

customer_reviews.title: Easy Recycle Bin
customer_reviews.text: This bin is just fine. It has clean lines and you pull both edges of the lid to snap it off. It's pretty tall which is nice, but the lid which swings down does cut in a bit to the bins capacity. The bin is so large though this shouldn't really be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered this black can two times. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this black can two times. The first time is came with no lid so I returned it. When it came back in stock I ordered the black can again. Today I received it and it's grey! very disappointing. Someone can't read! BLACK is what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: 16 Gallon Swing Can
customer_reviews.text: Seems really tough and the side latches insure that if it gets upset, the contents won't be all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Schoonover

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen size. Swing lid gets in the way.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size! Flip lid gets in the way when trying to dump larger dishes or trash items in.
customer_reviews.author: J.sparroh

customer_reviews.title: Only one draw back
customer_reviews.text: This is a super trash can. We have put them in all of the restrooms in the restaurants in our district. The one drawback is that two of the lids have gone missing, and you cannot get replacement lids from Simple Human.
customer_reviews.author: Diane I

product_meta.title: simplehuman 60 Liter / 16 Gallon Swing Lid Trash Can, Black Plastic
product_meta.description:
Color:Black Plastic| Style Name:Trash can onlyThe simplehuman swing lid plastic can is built with a heavy duty hinge for a smooth swing and added durability. The swing top is perfectly balanced to open easily and close quickly. Quick release buttons make the swing top quick and easy to remove for cleaning.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: Balanced Swing Lid - Center - weighted swing lid opens easily and then gently swings back into place
Perfect For Commercial Spaces - Large capacity and heavy-duty commercial-grade hinges make this an ideal choice for coffee shops or restaurants
Quick-Release Swing Lid - Quick-release buttons help to remove the swing lid for easy cleaning
Convenient Side Handles - Just grab the side handles to move the can
Enhance Your Trash Experience - Extra-strong and durable Code Q custom fit liners fit this can perfectly for a cleaner trash experience
5-Year Warranty - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home for years

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars176 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
